QuestData.Title: Michael Garrett
QuestData.Description: I have placed Brill's supplies into this crate. If you have already visited Brill and spoken with their bat master, then you may ride a bat back to her.$B$BSpeak with the Undercity's bat master, Michael Garrett. He can provide you with a bat to Brill.
QuestData.LogDescription: Bring Gordon's Crate to Michael Garrett.
QuestData.CompletionText: If you must travel a long distance, then a bat is your best option.
QuestData.RewardText: This crate must reach Brill quickly? That is easily done; our bats fly there daily.
